com.embeddedunveiled.serial

Class SerialComJNINativeInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComJNINativeInterface

  • public final class SerialComJNINativeInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is an interface between java and native shared library.

      • loadNativeLibrary

        public static boolean loadNativeLibrary(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                        java.lang.String loadedLibName,
                        SerialComSystemProperty serialComSystemProperty,
                        int osType,
                        int cpuArch,
                        int javaABIType)
                                 throws SerialComUnexpectedException,
                                        java.lang.SecurityException,
                                        SerialComLoadException,
                                        java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError

        Extract native library from jar in a working directory and load it.

        Parameters:
        directoryPath - null for default directory or user supplied directory path
        loadedLibName - null for default name or user supplied name of loaded library
        Throws:
        SerialComUnexpectedException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        SerialComLoadException
        java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError
